verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All of Your promises won't let go of me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I surrendered my life to Your ways newline I have learned what it means to obey newline Jesus, my heart has been changed by You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I am walking the path You have made newline I am seeking the truth everyday newline Jesus, my heart has been changed by You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I couldn't walk away if I tried newline Cause Your love is better than life

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Now, the sun's shining bright and it just won't set newline Cause Your love is alive and it lights my step newline My heart is amazed everyday to the next newline Your joy overtakes and I can't forget about it

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Oh Oh Oh( 3x) I can't forget about it

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: All of Your Promises won't let go of me (4X)
